meta.script: function waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time) { if(document.querySelector(selector)!=null) { var translate = document.getElementsByClassName("goog-te-combo")[0]; translate.setAttribute("aria-label", "Select language for translation");} else {setTimeout(function() { waitForTranslateToDisplay(selector, time);}, time);}}

span.a: Town of Hanover COVID-19 Information and Updates

div.p: We hope you are well and safe at home during this challenging time. Since we know you have received many emails with a...
I hope this message finds you and your families healthy in body and spirit. For the past three weeks, we have all been...

h3.a: Hanover Public Schools Special Education Update 4/4/20 »

div.p: I hope this message finds everyone safe and healthy! Our home learning plans for special education students continue...

h3.a: Hanover Fire Department's Safety and Emergency Tips for Students »

div.p: As students throughout the community continue to learn at home, our local fire and life safety educators wanted to take...

The Hanover School system aspires to exceed our current instructional capacity, and strengthen our inclusive culture of literacy, to deliver research based, impactful, effectively aligned, comprehensive literacy skills and strategies for students of all abilities; pre-kindergarten through graduation. To support this work, we will implement teacher centered training to raise the instructional capacity of HPS staff. This increased capacity, in turn, will support the development of exceptional readers, writers, and thinkers by incorporating the essential components of a comprehensive literacy program: phonics, phonemic awareness, comprehension, vocabulary, fluency, and writing.

li.a: Learn more about the initative and view media and resources
